data.message: Thank You Facebook, my girlfriend had me sign up and I thought I was too old...but wow was she right, I have found friends from grammar school whom I haven't seen since I was 12 years old! another friend just recently whom it has been 35 years!! and come to find out she is an hour away!! Once this crazy winter gets over we will be having good ole memory's ,Thanks for showing me how easy it can be to be a help to people or pets the need donations to stay alive ,and wouldn't be here today with out all the help that got passed all around the world!! What a wonderful and gracious thing to be able to have access too!!! So THANK YOU Facebook.

replies.message: Thanks, Margaret. It's stories like yours that keep us working hard everyday. We look forward to keeping you connected for years to come! -Ryan
thank u Facebook for everything, u have connected me to many Family members I can't c just a shout out to u
Try to look at my video and all I got was pictures
You are a gift to mankind. Thank you. May this gift always be respected and appreciated.
thank you facebook, how can i share my facebook look back? i love it.
Thank's FB for helping me reconnect with my Mom's family in Cebu, Philippines via the "Montecillo Pride" group now 289 strong! Happy 10th Anniv. FB!
Danke Facebook für die tollen Videos und alles gute zum 10ten Geburtstag. Danke
